name: Ansible
body:
### Welcome to my "Windows Modules" for Ansible GitHub Repo. Install Notes: >> [https://github.com/baldersd/Ansible/blob/master/ANSIBLE.one](https://github.com/baldersd/Ansible/blob/master/ANSIBLE.one) Code Directory > https://github.com/baldersd/Ansible Windows Remote Nodes Pre-Reqs: -------------------------------- PRE-Windows 2012 there are some requirements: Needs Winrm Core Framework installed. Needs Powershell 3.0 min installed. (above have dependency on .NET4 framework) – bulky install. General Requirements (all Windows): If we want to use WinRM over HTTPS --- needs a non-self-signed “server auth” certificate installed into localmachine\my ----can generate this with powershell or a windows CA. Needs the winrm qc issued to open firewall ports If we want to add ports manually need tcp 5985-5986 +Need to open icmp v4 echo. ### Sample PS1: 
#!powershell
# WANT_JSON
# POWERSHELL_COMMON
$params = Parse-Args $args $true;
#use this for intercepting the args --> #$data = Get-Attr $params "data" "pong";

$data = Get-Process -Name lsass | ft | Out-File c:\result.txt
$result = New-Object psobject @{
    changed = $false
};
Exit-Json $result;

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
